alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong surface winds associated with virga showers will impact northwest Pueblo county, including PUEBLO RESERVOIR through 4 pm... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong surface winds 7 miles northwest of Pueblo West, or 15 miles northwest of Pueblo, moving east at 20 mph. THESE STRONG WINDS WILL AFFECT PUEBLO RESERVOIR. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pueblo West around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
